src="/cdap/static/js/chunk-echarts.fd78cd7a.js"></script><script src="/cdap/static/js/app.378f5f1e.js"></script><script>(function(){
  //校验猎豹浏览器
  function checkLB(userAgent){
    const isLbBrowser = userAgent.indexOf('LBBROWSER') > -1
    let lbBrowserVersion = 0
    const r = /Chrome\/(\d+)/g
    const matchs= r.exec(userAgent)
    if(Array.isArray(matchs) && matchs.length >=2){
      lbBrowserVersion = +matchs[1]
    }
    // element plus最低兼容chrome 64
    return isLbBrowser && lbBrowserVersion < 64
  }

  function browserCheck(){
    const explorer = window.navigator.userAgent
    const isIE = !!window.ActiveXObject || 'ActiveXObject' in window
    const isUC = explorer.indexOf("UBrowser") > -1
    const isLB = checkLB(explorer)
    if(isIE || isUC || isLB){
      alert('您目前使用的浏览器不兼容，建议使用Chrome、Firefox、Safari、Edge、QQ浏览器、360浏览器极速模式、搜狗浏览器、猎豹安全浏览器8.0。')
    }
  }
  browserCheck()
})()</script><div class="el-overlay" style="z-index: 2001; display: none;"><div class="el-overlay-dialog"><!--v-if--></div></div><div class="el-overlay" style="z-index: 2002; display: none;"><div class="el-overlay-dialog"><!--v-if--></div></div><div id="el-popper-container-5279"><div class="el-popper is-pure is-light el-select__popper auto-select" role="tooltip" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 2009; display: none; position: absolute; left: 804px; top: 839.333px; margin: 0px;" data-popper-reference-hidden="" data-popper-placement="top-start"><!-- Workaround bug #6378 --><div class="el-select-dropdown auto-select" style="min-width: 110px;"><div class="el-scrollbar" style=""><div class="el-select-dropdown__wrap el-scrollbar__wrap el-scrollbar__wrap--hidden-default"><ul class="el-scrollbar__view el-select-dropdown__list" style=""><!--v-if--><li class="el-select-dropdown__item selected"><span>10条/页</span></li><li class="el-select-dropdown__item"><span>20条/页</span></li><li class="el-select-dropdown__item"><span>30条/页</span></li><li class="el-select-dropdown__item"><span>40条/页</span></li></ul></div><div class="el-scrollbar__bar is-horizontal" style="display: none;"><div class="el-scrollbar__thumb" style="transform: translateX(0%);"></div></div><div class="el-scrollbar__bar is-vertical" style="display: none;"><div class="el-scrollbar__thumb" style="transform: translateY(0%);"></div></div></div><!--v-if--></div><span class="el-popper__arrow" data-popper-arrow="" style="position: absolute; left: 5.33333px;"></span><span id="el-id-6713-1" role="tooltip" style="position: absolute; border: 0px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; clip: rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px); white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal;"></span></div></div></body>
